questions.quote: ......laugh , everything's nice and at the end of the night I go for a little contact. I get the PULL BACK. This woman said the filthiest things I've ever heard in my life. I get the Pull Back.
That's the idea. That's what's clever about it, that they're not talking about the pants.
Oh trust me. He's a bad seed. He's a horrible seed. He's one of the worst seeds I've ever seen.
Alright. So, get a load of this. This guy, Fred Yerkes, remembers every little thing about that night except me.
Yeah, I know champagne, limos, cigars. WHAT happened to the papers?
Yeah, it was, but then I just couldn't decide if he was really sponge-worthy.
All right, look. I'm getting the Chow Fung. You don't have to have any.
All he has to do now is count his blessings, say a prayer, and he's done. Do you believe this?
Now are you just sayin' you want to have fun or do you reallllly want to have fun?!
You're not the only one improving yourself. I worked out with a dumbbell yesterday. I feel *vigorous*.
